Steps.Message: Update at 07:44 - We have a relief specialist team to take over from the engineers who have been working overnight. To allow them time to arrive and locate and repair the underground cable fault we're now estimating to have the power back on between 12:00 and 13:00. We can appreciate how frustrating and disruptive being without power can be, and our staff will work as fast as they can. If you have any questions or concerns, call our team anytime on 08003163105. We'll update you again once the team arrive.

We became aware of a power cut at 01:49. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 07:44 - We have a relief specialist team to take over from the engineers who have been working overnight. To allow them time to arrive and locate and repair the underground cable fault we're now estimating to have the power back on between 12:00 and 13:00. We can appreciate how frustrating and disruptive being without power can be, and our staff will work as fast as they can. If you have any questions or concerns, call our team anytime on 08003163105. We'll update you again once the team arrive.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
